name: Surf Excel Hygienic Clean
description: Surf Excel believes that every stain a child brings home is an experience and a value learned. If a child learns something and gets dirty in the process, then stains are Good. New Surf Excel Hygienic Clean with Hygiene boosters helps destroy 99.9% of Germs and removes tough stains. The easily dissolvable powder will leave your clothes spotless and with an incredible fragrance. Let your kids explore and bring home experiences while Surf Excel will take care of the stains. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
